data.eml:eml: Phlegra Simon, 1876, Phintella Strand 1906 and Yamangalea Maddison, 2009 (Arachnida: Araneae: Salticidae) — new species and new generic records for Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Żabka, Marek (2012): Phlegra Simon, 1876, Phintella Strand 1906 and Yamangalea Maddison, 2009 (Arachnida: Araneae: Salticidae) — new species and new generic records for Australia. Zootaxa 3176: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279921
